PositionHistory.Description:
Contributions:
● GRelDAL: Bidirectional RDBMS ● Rolify (Hierarchical role management and resource to GraphQL mapping solution scoping library for ruby): Improved mongodb integration for Node.js support & test matrix (using appraisals). ● InGenR: Solution for language ● Codiad (Web based IDE): Enhancements around project agnostic inline code generation management and optimizations around client-server ● Fluid Outliner: Offline-enabled information exchange. PWA Outliner ● Knex (SQL Query builder): Enhancements around typescript integration

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 75% of this job

Degree.Comments: B. Tech (Computer Science and Engineering) from IIT Kharagpur (4 yrs, on campus, CGPA: 7.8 / 10, completed: 2013)
XII: CBSE, Science+Maths, Completed: 2008, Marks: 92.6% X: CBSE, Completed: 2006, Marks: 93.6

Book.Title: FSEProceedings of the9th Joint Meeting on Foundations of based strategy for optimally parallelized automated instrumentation of SAP/ABAP applications in constrained environments

Qualifications.QualificationSummary:
Skills / Exposure: Online presence
Frontend Development: lorefnon.tech twitter.com/lorefnon Proficient: Javascript, Typescript, React, Redux, MobX, GraphQL, github.com/lorefnon Backbone, Knockout, Sass
Basic: ReasonML, WebAssembly Interest Areas Backend Development: Web development Proficient: Ruby on Rails, Node.js, Socket.io Real time technologies Intermediate: AWS (EC2, ECS, S3, RS, DPS), Protobuf, ZMQ System integrations Basic: Meteor.js, Java, GAE, Clojure
Functional programming Infrastructure technologies Persistence Solutions:
Intermediate: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Redis
Experience (6 years):
D. E. Shaw Pvt Ltd. (Full time role) (Project Leader (Current): 1yr, 7 mo) (Senior Member, Technical: 1yr, 8 mo)
Collaborated with multiple teams (in US, London and Hyd) on migrating applications (for trading, portfolio management, data analysis, forecasting etc.) from legacy java portal stack to microservice based web applications.
As a member of a small portal infrastructure team, facilitated service integrations at Node.js layer and library support for business aware components based on React, Redux, Webpack and modern web technologies.
Led the development of a unified reporting solution for static and web based dynamic (real time) reports which replaces multiple legacy solutions. Led the development of an integrated component-oriented discussion management solution for trade collaboration within application dashboards.
Contributed to internal exploratory documentation and API discovery site, and data analysis components for pivoting, multi-dimensional exploration, drill down analysis etc.
Assisted in onboarding of Java/Python developers to modern (ES6+) javascript and typescript stack.
StudyPad (Full time role, Ruby on Rails developer, 2 yrs)
Worked on backend APIs for mobile clients, payment integrations with stripe, A/B testing setups, infrastructure orchestration (AWS).
Worked on real time course progress monitoring dashboard powered by Rails and Knockout.js.
Nifty Window (Full time role, Web developer, 1 yr)
Worked on java based backend APIs for GAE integrated web services for E-commerce, marketing and advertising domains. Built integrated dashboards for managing flow of consumer interactions on different social platforms using Backbone.js, jQuery, jade etc.
IBM Research, India (Internship, Research trainee: 3 mo)
Worked on devising new effective methodologies for determination of execution history of enterprise applications hosted in change-controlled client deployments.
Open Source Work

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Gaurab Paul's experience appears to be strongly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Programming) and slightly concentrated in Finance (mostly Compliance). Gaurab Paul's experience appears to be entry level, with 0 months of experience.

sov:Findings.sov:Information: [Sovren:303;1] The following section in the resume contains more content than the work history and education sections combined: 'Skills'. This may indicate a problem with section headers, formatting, or content.
[Sovren:312;3] The following section in the resume contains more content than recommended: 'Publications' This section should be less than 10 lines long as it can cause errors in parsing the resume.
[Sovren:213;] A street level address was not found in the contact information. A full contact address should always be included in a resume as it allows for location based searches.
[Sovren:221;POS-1] We could not find a job title for: POS-1. Every position in a resume should have a job title.
[Sovren:222;POS-1] No employer name was found for: POS-1. Every position in a resume should have an employer name.
[Sovren:224;POS-1] The following work history position does not have a start date: POS-1. Every position in a resume should have a start date.
[Sovren:225;POS-1] The following work history position does not have an end date: POS-1. Every position in a resume should have an end date, unless it is a currently held position.
[Sovren:226;] We found no work history positions within the past year. A resume should include work history information, including time off, for the most recent year.
[Sovren:232;DEG-2] The following educational degree is not associated with a school: DEG-2. Every degree in a resume should be associated with a school.

[Sovren:112;] The following section was identified as a skills section type: 'Skills'. Skills should not be in a separate section, but instead, each skill should be included in the descriptions of work history or education.

[Sovren:151;1,2] The following sections do not have the header on a separate line: 'Skills', 'Personal Projects'. Every section should have a clear, unambiguous, commonly-used header on a separate line directly above the content associated with it.
[Sovren:161;DEG-2] High school (or lower) education should not be included on resumes that contain higher-level education.

sov:ResumeUserArea.sov:ParserConfigurationString: Coverage.MilitaryHistoryAndSecurityCredentials = True; Coverage.PatentsPublicationsAndSpeakingEvents = True; Coverage.PersonalAttributes = True; Coverage.Training = True; Culture.CountryCodeForUnitedKingdomIsUK = True; Culture.DefaultCountryCode = IN; Culture.DefaultCultureIsIndia = True; Culture.Language = English; Culture.PreferEnglishVersionIfTwoLanguagesInDocument = False; Data.UserDefinedParsing = False; OutputFormat.AssumeCompanyNameFromPrecedingJob = False; OutputFormat.ContactMethod.PackStyle = Split; OutputFormat.DateOutputStyle = ExplicitlyKnownDateInfoOnly; OutputFormat.NestJobsBasedOnDateRanges = True; OutputFormat.NormalizeRegions = False; OutputFormat.SkillsStyle = Default; OutputFormat.StripParsedDataFromPositionHistoryDescription = True; OutputFormat.TelcomNumber.Style = Raw; OutputFormat.XmlFormat = HrXmlResume25
